Awtrix 3 Drawing Preview

Drawing Commands (JSON)

Available Commands

  • dp: Draw pixel [x, y, color]
  • dl: Draw line [x0, y0, x1, y1, color]
  • dr: Draw rectangle [x, y, width, height, color]
  • df: Fill rectangle [x, y, width, height, color]
  • dc: Draw circle [x, y, radius, color]
  • dfc: Fill circle [x, y, radius, color]
  • dt: Draw text [x, y, text, color]

Colors: Hex format "#RRGGBB" or RGB array [r, g, b] (0-255)
